doc.title: The National Film Board of Canada's Animation Festival
doc.plot: The Balgonie Birdman: The tale of a man in Balgonie, Saskatchewan, who builds a flying machine. Every Dog's Guide to the Playground: Wally the Safety Dog instructs his master in the rules of playground safety. Vignette: Para Sight: Drawings take on a life of their own. Jours de Plaine: Folk "Music Video" of one's homeland. French. Strings: The relationship of two strangers in adjoining apartments. The Lump: A loner's odd growth gains him popularity and power. The Apprentice: An old fool teaches his young apprentice about the consequences of taking the wrong road. Blackfly: A song based on the trials of working in Northern Ontario.
